pullrequest.title: Updated IMU sensor to support six generic noise models

content.raw:
Seems to work fine for me. 

Just one detail: @asymingt [wrote](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_design/pull-request/19/improve-sensor-noise-models/diff#Limprove_sensors/update_imu_noise.mdT55) an open question about how to upgrade current models. I did not found any solution. Is this not strictly needed to get this PR approved?
content.html:
